objects.name: Recruit (Tan Binh)
objects.source_note: Rank table defines Recruit as the starting rank.

objects.name: Warrior (Chien Binh)
objects.source_note: Rank table defines Warrior as an intermediate rank.

objects.name: Legend (Chien Than)
objects.special_rules: Players in top 100 receive numbered badges.
objects.source_note: Rank table and context define Legend as the highest rank.

systems.name: Leaderboard System
systems.description: A system for ranking players based on various metrics such as Elo, Combat Score, and Objective Score.
systems.mechanics: Players are ranked in leaderboards like Season Rank, Combat Board, Objective Board, and Class Boards. Rankings reset periodically.
systems.objectives: To provide a competitive, transparent, and fair ranking system that motivates players.
systems.source_note: Described in sections 3, 4, and 8 of the GDD.

systems.name: Season Rank System
systems.mechanics: Elo is updated after matches using Delta = K * (S - E) * V formula. Resets every 8-12 weeks.
systems.objectives: To rank players based on skill level.
systems.source_note: Detailed in section 4.1 of the GDD.

systems.name: Combat Board System
systems.mechanics: Uses Combat Score (CS) calculated from KDA Impact, Damage Score, and Streak Bonus.
systems.objectives: To highlight players with strong combat performance.
systems.source_note: Detailed in section 4.2 of the GDD.

systems.name: Objective Board System
systems.mechanics: Uses Objective Score (OS) calculated from Capture Score, Defense Score, and Zone Time Score.
systems.objectives: To reward players contributing to team objectives.
systems.source_note: Detailed in section 4.3 of the GDD.

logic_rules.description: Elo score is updated after each match based on the formula Delta = K * (S - E) * V.
logic_rules.effect: Player's Elo score is adjusted based on match result, expected win probability, and performance modifier.
logic_rules.source_note: Formula detailed in section 4.1 of the GDD.

logic_rules.description: Combat Score (CS) is calculated using KDA Impact, Damage Score, and Streak Bonus.
logic_rules.effect: Player's CS is updated and used in Combat Board rankings.
logic_rules.source_note: Formula detailed in section 4.2 of the GDD.

logic_rules.description: Objective Score (OS) is calculated using Capture Score, Defense Score, and Zone Time Score.
logic_rules.effect: Player's OS is updated and used in Objective Board rankings.
logic_rules.source_note: Formula detailed in section 4.3 of the GDD.

logic_rules.description: Assists are awarded if a player contributes to an enemy's death within 10 seconds.
logic_rules.effect: Player receives assist points if conditions are met.
logic_rules.source_note: Detailed in section 11 of the GDD.

requirements.title: Leaderboard UI Implementation
requirements.description: Develop a user-friendly interface for displaying leaderboards.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: UI must include tabs for My Elo, Top Elo, Top Class, and Season Information. List view must display Rank, Name, Class Icon, Tier/Score, WR, Matches, and Δ.
requirements.source_note: Detailed in section 8 of the GDD.

requirements.title: Season Reset Mechanism
requirements.description: Implement periodic resets for Season Rank and other leaderboards.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Season Rank resets every 8-12 weeks. Combat Score by Class resets monthly. Rotating boards reset weekly.
requirements.source_note: Detailed in section 3.2 of the GDD.

requirements.title: Anti-Cheat Measures
requirements.description: Implement systems to detect and prevent cheating.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: System must filter outliers, detect boosting heuristics, and apply decay for inactivity.
requirements.source_note: Detailed in section 6 of the GDD.

requirements.title: Reward Distribution System
requirements.description: Distribute rewards based on leaderboard rankings.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Top players receive Battle Pass Points and Currency. Avoid large reward disparities between ranks.
requirements.source_note: Detailed in section 7 of the GDD.
